items.title: Clorox (CLX) Down 3.7% Since Last Earnings Report: Can It Rebound?
items.description: Clorox (CLX) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.

items.title: How Trump Inspired One Law Firm to Blitz Brands With ‘Made in USA’ Challenges
items.description: A rising number of lawsuits accuse household brands of misleading consumers when they said their products were made in the United States.

items.title: Meet the Law Firm Driving a Surge in ‘Made in America’ Advertising Suits
items.description: A rising number of lawsuits accuse household brands of misleading consumers when they said their products were made in the United States.
